title: Luxury 3 bed apartment for immediate sale
details:
Three bedroom apartment in an ongoing luxury condominium project due to be completed in June 2018.

This condominium comprises of 38 spacious apartments on eight floors. It is centrally located in the heart of Colpetty and tastefully designed to suit your luxury lifestyle.

The unit spans 1548sq feet and consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living and dining, closed kitchen and a maid’s room with bathroom. It has a view of the sea and the common facilities include swimming pool, gym and play area.
